amendment.description: To require that evaluation reports are due every fourth year, to establish a reservation of funds in a fiscal year in which a report is due, and to establish a reduction in funds if a report is not submitted.

action.text: Amendment SA 3380 proposed by Senator Lee to Amendment SA 3378.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3380 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 40 - 58. Record Vote Number: 213.
